explanation: Yuki claims she was only in the third-floor conference room for two hours prepping for sprint planning. But Clue 3 shows the elevator traveled from floor three to floor two at 3:10 PM â€” and Clue 1 shows the thermostat password was changed at 3:15 PM from the office Wi-Fi, with the panel located on the second floor. Clue 2 confirms Yuki was the only person in the building Sunday. She detoured to the thermostat panel between sprints of her 'sprint planning' prep.
funFact: Office thermostat disputes are so common that a study found 42% of employees have argued with a coworker about the temperature.
